body.name: [2024 Newest Auto Focus & Keystone] Projector with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2, ALVAR Portable Outdoor Projector 4K, Super Low Noise, Dust-Proof, 50% Zoom, 500 ANSI Native 1080P Proyector TV Stick PPT
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 28 mins
features: ➤【Auto Focus & Keystone, Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance & Screen Alignment】 ALVAR movie projector features fully automatic adjustment for AI intelligent cinematic entertainment. Auto focus and auto keystone correction obtain the consistently sharp rectangular image. Meanwhile, intelligent obstacle avoidance and screen alignment allow proyector to automatically adjust its display to avoid obstacles like paintings, plants, or other objects, and to seamlessly align the projected image with screen.

➤【Fastest WiFi 6 & Bidirectional Bluetooth 5.2】This projector with WiFi and Bluetooth adopts the top WiFi 6 Tech that operates on both of the 2.4GHz and 5GHz frequency bands, ensuring more stable signal, Lower latency and faster transmission for best wireless screen mirroring. Moreover, LS55 proyector supports two-way Bluetooth, which not only can work as a standalone Bluetooth speaker but also can connect to external speakers for enhanced sound.

➤【True Fully-Sealed Engine & Super Low Noise＜20dB】This portable mini projector is built around fully sealed engine, which can be verified in structure (while some of other projectors are fake advertisement in market), effectively avoiding screen black spots and image quality loss for long-lasting performance. What's more? It's the first projector ever with super low noise below 20dB, creating very quiet viewing environment to highly immerse yourself into the outstanding audiovisual experience.

➤【Integrated Mini Stand & Office PPT Supported】Its sleek portable design with leather handle and mini stand, effortlessly resolves the upright projector's angle adjustment challenge wherever you go. Additionally, this versatile home outdoor proyector is ideal for your on-the-go presentation or office help. Once you're ready, easily plug in your USB drive to present your PowerPoint, Excel, Word, or PDF files. (Please play the copyrighted contents or 4k videos with TV Stick/Laptop via HDMI.).

➤【Native 1080P & 4K Supported & 500 ANSI & 50% Zoom】LS55 projector 4k equipped with imported precision glass lens delivers exceptional image quality with native 1080P resolution and impressive 20000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio for cinematic visual delight. Also with zoom in and zoom out function, the projection size can be freely adjusted from 50% to 100%, to match any wall or screen. ALAVR offers lifetime customer support for any questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

productInformation.name: Connectivity Technology
productInformation.value: WiFi; Bluetooth; HDMI; USB; Audio; Wireless; Wired

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FULL AUTO FOCUS Get a clear picture within 5 seconds after starting up! Also, when the projector detects shaking/rapid movement, it will automatically refocus. After the projector completes the automatic focus process, you can fine-tune the focus by using the "F+" and "F-" buttons on the remote control to achieve the best image quality. AUTO KEYSTONE CORRECTION Get a perfect rectangular picture within 5 seconds after starting up! Additionally, when the projector detects shaking or rapid movement, it triggers automatic keystone correction to ensure the image is always perfectly aligned without the need for manual adjustments! If you think the shape is not perfectly enough, you can also utilize the four-point keystone correction to manually correct the image shape. INTELLIGENT OBSTACLE AVOIDANCE The intelligent obstacle avoidance feature enables the projector to automatically adjust its displayed content to avoid obstacles like paintings, plants, or other objects. Before enabling intelligent obstacle avoidance, make sure auto keystone correction is enabled. Please be aware that it may not recognize white or transparent tape as obstacles. INTELLIGENT SCREEN ALIGNMENT The industry-leading technology of intelligent screen adaption enables the projector to automatically adjust its image to match your screen size. When activating the intelligent screen alignment, use a 16:9 aspect ratio screen with black borders for optimal results. Please know that when both intelligent obstacle avoidance and intelligent screen alignment functions are enabled simultaneously, priority is given to intelligent screen alignment, with intelligent obstacle avoidance being secondary.
Previous page Next page 1 Auto Focus & Keystone 2 Auto Obstacle Avoidance 3 Auto Screen Alignment 4 Powerful Chip
Previous page Next page 1 Dust-proof Engine 2 Super Low Noise 3 1080P Full HD 4 Coated All-glass Lens 5 Genuine Leather Handle
Previous page Next page 1 WiFi 6 Technology 2 Two-way Bluetooth 5.2 3 Streaming with TV Stick 4 IMAX Display

Can i use the smartphone to mirror the content of some streaming services? Yes, but copyrighted content from Hulu, Netflix, Disney+, etc., can't be mirrored over phone. Play these videos by inserting a TV stick or Roku stick into the projector. Additionally, it supports 4K video playing via HDMI for 4K devices, not USB. How to synchronize the mobile phone screen to the projector? For iOS System: Ensure both your iOS device and projector are connected to the same router's WiFi. For Android System: Turn on the WLAN switch on your Android device. Copyrighted content from streaming services CAN NOT be mirrored or casted. Can it automatically avoid obstacles and adjust the projected image to match my screen size? Yes, the intelligent obstacle avoidance and screen alignment enable the projector to automatically adjust its display, avoiding obstacles such as paintings, plants, or other objects, and seamlessly aligning the projected image with the screen. Does it work for PowerPoint presentation? Yes, once ready, plug in your USB drive to start presenting PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and PDF files. Please note that the USB port is only for reading files from a USB drive and cannot be used for screen mirroring with smartphones. I can't get the sound working. Any suggestions? Dolby sound is not supported. If there's no sound, turn off Dolby sound on your connected devices or apps (Settings > Display & Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > Turn off Dolby Digital Plus).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to have
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice to have!This projector delivers clear, vibrant visuals, providing an outstanding visual experience whether in a meeting room or a home theater!The projector's high brightness ensures clear visibility even in well-lit environments. Additionally, the ability to read office files directly from a USB drive, making it an ideal choice for business presentations and educational purposes.I appreciate the portability of this projector—compact, easy to carry, and equipped with various interfaces for convenient usage. It truly allows for the enjoyment of large-screen audiovisuals anytime, anywhere.When moving the projector, it automatically triggers autofocus and keystone correction, ensuring that you can constantly enjoy clear rectangular images. By enabling obstacle avoidance and automatic screen fit functions in the settings, the projection navigates around obstacles and aligns perfectly with my screen, making it incredibly convenient for a novice like me.The built-in speakers deliver loud and clear sound, exceeding my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product, a definite recommendation!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Absolutely thrilled with this product - a definite recommendation! My previous projector was a bit cumbersome to use, and by chance, I came across this one. I decided to make the purchase, and to my delight, it arrived in just 2 days! The aesthetic is adorable and neat, with the added convenience of a carrying strap for easy portability.One standout feature is the auto-focus capability. Being able to set it to auto-adjust every time I turn it on has saved me a significant amount of time. Meanwhile, intelligent obstacle avoidance and screen alignment allow proyector to automatically adjust its display to avoid obstacles like paintings, plants, or other objects, and to seamlessly align the projected image with screen. – these features I didn't know I needed until now. Additionally, I experimented with projecting from different angles, and the image remained impressively clear and sharp, enhancing the overall viewing experience.What adds to the convenience is the compatibility with Apple products. No need for an HDMI cable – I can effortlessly use Apple Play, making it incredibly convenient for seamless connectivity. The versatility of this projector has truly exceeded my expectations.Moreover, the quick delivery time and the user-friendly setup process made the overall experience even more enjoyable. The compact design and the carrying strap make it easy for me to take it anywhere I want, whether it's for a movie night with friends or a presentation on the go.All in all, I am not only satisfied but genuinely impressed with this projector. It has made my entertainment and presentation experiences much more enjoyable and hassle-free. Highly recommended for anyone in need of a reliable and user-friendly projector!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This projector offers great value for money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This projector is truly impressive - aesthetically pleasing, easy to use, featuring genuine autofocus and automatic screen fit. It allows for easy adjustments in size, angle, and clarity.The image quality is superb, even in daylight with the curtains drawn, and especially at night, the colors are vivid with no distortion. No need for a screen, projecting directly onto a white wall yields very satisfying results. The sound quality is fantastic, providing a surround sound feel when the door is closed, which is particularly gratifying.Its compact size makes it convenient to carry, seamlessly transitioning between rooms and living spaces with exceptional clarity. The inclusion of a stand adds to its convenience, providing a good effect.The projector boasts powerful features, connecting seamlessly to phones, computers, and TVs. I tried wireless screen mirroring from my phone, and the results were excellent.This projector offers great value for money. Whether it's the picture or sound quality, both are commendable. The visual clarity is outstanding, and I highly recommend it to everyone.

Good Projector. The delivery was on time and box was undamaged. Easy to set up just plug in and go. Picture is crisp and bright even with the light on in the room. Sound is good for a little speaker. The projector worked flawlessly once powered up, hdmi usb and casting. The remote works great even when not pointed at the ir receiver. The remote needs two AAA batteries. The Bluetooth feature worked well when connected to a portable speaker. Volume control while using Bluetooth was flawless. The controls on the projector were a nice surprise and worked well. Focus adjustment knob was smooth and worked well. The cooling fan is quiet and the volume is not overwhelming. The carrying handle is a nice feature and makes for easy setup. The small size will be great for storage when not in use. We watched a netflix movies and I was quite impressed with the overall picture no blurred moments or pauses. The projector shipped with an av cable, hdmi cable and power cord. A storage bag would of been a great addition to this package to keep it dust free. There is also a lens protector that is easily attached and removed. Watching movies from the usb port worked amazing with no issues. This projector will be great on camping trips where space is an issue. All and all this projector is a good bang for your buck! Auto focus makes it easier to focus and did amazing job! Recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Immersive Cinema at Home: ALVAR Movie Projector Review
reviews.reviewText: My ALVAR Movie Projector Experience: A Game-Changer for Home EntertainmentI recently got my hands on the ALVAR movie projector, and I can't contain my excitement about the transformative cinematic experience it brings to my living room. This projector is not just a piece of tech; it's a game-changer. Here's why it has become my new favorite entertainment companion:Auto Focus & Keystone Correction:No more fussing around with manual adjustments. The ALVAR projector takes care of everything with its auto focus and keystone correction. The result? A consistently sharp and perfectly rectangular image every time I turn it on.Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance & Screen Alignment:What blew me away is the intelligent obstacle avoidance. It's like the projector has a mind of its own, adjusting the display to dodge obstacles effortlessly. And the seamless alignment with the screen? It's a small detail that makes a big difference.Fastest WiFi 6 & Bidirectional Bluetooth 5.2:Say goodbye to lag and connectivity issues. With WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2, the ALVAR projector ensures a stable connection for flawless wireless screen mirroring. Plus, it moonlights as a Bluetooth speaker, making movie nights even more immersive.True Fully-Sealed Engine & Super Low Noise:The fully-sealed engine is not just a marketing term. It's a promise of long-lasting performance. And the super low noise level? I didn't even realize it was on until I saw the crystal-clear visuals on my wall.Business Presentation & Integrated Mini Stand:For someone always on the go, the ALVAR projector is a lifesaver. Plug in a USB drive, and I'm ready to present. The mini stand makes it a breeze to set up anywhere. Perfect for impromptu business meetings or spontaneous movie nights with friends.Native 1080P & 4K Supported & 500 ANSI & 50% Zoom:The visuals are nothing short of stunning. Native 1080P resolution, 4K support, and that precision glass lens make movie nights an absolute delight. And the zoom function? It gives me the freedom to adjust the size based on my mood and space.In conclusion, the ALVAR movie projector isn't just a piece of tech; it's a cinematic companion that has elevated my home entertainment to new heights. With ALVAR's lifetime customer support, I feel like I've made a smart investment. Say goodbye to mediocre movie nights and hello to an immersive cinematic experience with the ALVAR projector. It's a decision I'm happy I made.

reviews.reviewTitle: I'm very impressed with the quality of this projector.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this projector every day for a few weeks now and have to say I'm very impressed with it.The build quality and design are top notch. This leather strap is such a beautiful touch.The sound quantity of an inbuilt speaker is pretty amazing. There is even an option to use the projector as a bluetooth speaker.The connection process is seamless regardless of the device I use. Works perfectly with iPad and Android.The picture quality is great. The colours are deep and vivid.With a projector sitting about 6FT from a wall the picture diagonal is about 65 inches. Automatic adjustment does work wonderfully.The unit itself is very quiet the fan hum is barely noticeable.HDMI, 3.5 jack, USB and AV connectors are the back of the projector.The interface menu is very simple and smooth. The remote is super handy.There is an HDMI in the box and AV adapter making it truly plug and play out of the box.All and all this projector is a solid unit. Pleasure to use and look at. Very happy with this purchase.

The media could not be loaded. This projector is much better than my old one. Its is compact and stylish. It is very clear and bright even during the day. We use this against a white wall in our dining room and its like having a 70 inch TV! The sound is crisp and loud that you would not need external speakers or soundbar anymore. I also like that it has autofocus which os very convenient. I would definitely recommend!

The media could not be loaded. I have tried four different projectors at this point, and I have a slightly nicer, brighter, better sounding one, but this balance of price and features of this one might actually be my favorite. It's plenty bright, and it sounds about as good as a TV without a separate soundbar.The autofocus works like a million bucks, and it focuses automatically every time you turn it on, and there's an option for it to refocus if you move the projector around. If the image is still blur, shake the monitor a bit and the auto focus will be in function again.I haven't had very good luck with the auto-Keystone adjustment, but I think that's because the environment around my 100" screen is too busy for it to latch onto the perimeter. But the on-screen manual adjustment is quick and intuitive and does a great job. It has some smart-TV selections built in, like Netflix and YouTube, but I use a $20 dongle to bring in all of our subscribed services like YouTube TV and Amazon Prime Video. This also allows a Bluetooth connection to our TV's soundbar.
